title.rendered: DASH OFFROAD Y62 Patrol Big O WIDE DELUXE HBMC Rock Sliders (no tops)

content.rendered:
Dash Offroad Y62 Patrol Big O WIDE DELUXE HBMC Rock Sliders (no tops)

 

Introducing the new Big O “Wide Deluxe” Sliders. These are made with the same proven bracket design that allows maximum strength and minimum weight. The “Wide Deluxe” model however has an added a bump at the front so to assist in pushing you away from obstacles when in reverse (I know Y62’s rarely need to reverse on a track) similar to the way the rear kicker assists in forward progress.

To suit: Y62 Patrol STL, Ti, TiL – S1, 2, 3, 4, 5

Construction:

  • 1.75” Seamless Race Tube for an increased strength to weight ratio than mild steel.
  • CAD designed, laser cut brackets
  • Australian Made

Slider Surface: Powder coat textured black finish.
